sourcesContent:
const weekendapi = [
    {
      id: 1,
      image: "https://www.plushescapes.com/images/uploads/attachments/56594748173702583209455864742972365008756n.jpg",
      title: "Mount Abbot ",
      info: " Picturesque Hamlet",
      to: '/abbotmount',
      name: 'Mount Abbot',
      p1: 'A hidden gem in the Kali Kumaon region.',
      p2: 'Has worlds second-highest cricket pitch.',
      p3: 'Breathtaking views of sunrises, sunsets',
      p4:' Charming colonial heritage.'
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/5500603_18072520340067112871.jpg",
      title: "Bhowali ",
      info: " Neem Karori Baba Ashram",
      to: '/bhowali',
      name: 'Bhowali',
      p1: 'Heart of the states fruit basket.',
      p2: 'Gateway to Kumaon region.',
      p3: 'Pristine nature and scenic grandeur',
      p4:'Home to Neem Karoli Baba ashram,'
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-06/Bhimtal_Feature.jpg",
      title: "Bhimtal",
      info: "Island on the Lake",
      to: '/bhimtal',
      name: 'Bhimtal',
      p1: ' Surrounded by dense forests of oak, pine.',
      p2: 'Has several historical sites.',
      p3: 'large number of butterflies',
      p4: 'Offers unparalleled adventure activities.'
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      image: "",
      title: "Ghangharia",
      info: "Base camp for trekkers",
      to: '/ghangharia',
      name: 'Ghangharia',
      p1: 'Popular base for trekkers.',
      p2: 'Breathtaking landscape.',
      p3: 'Last human settlement',
      p4:'Located in the Chamoli district.'
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2021-07/Darma%20Valley_Feature.jpg",
      title: "Darma Valley",
      info: "Trek the Himalayas",
      to: '/darma',
      name: 'Darma Valley',
      p1: 'Famous for the Darma Valley trek.',
      p2: 'Attracts trekkers from across the world.',
      p3: 'Enjoy local life in village home-stays',
      p4:'Offers stunning views of Panchachuli.'
     
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      image: "images/places/chitai.jpg",
      title: "Chitai Temple",
      info: "Gaur Bhairav",
      to: '/chitai',
      name: 'Chitai',
      p1: 'Dedicated to Goljyu Devta.',
      p2: 'Regarded as god of Justice.',
      p3: 'Famous Pilgrimage places.',
      p4:' 9kms from Almora.'
    },
    {
      id: 7,
      image: "images/places/Badrinath.jpeg",
      title: "Char-Dham",
      info: "Pride of Uttarakhand",
      to: '/chardham',
      name: 'Char-Dham',
      p1: 'Nestled in the Garhwal Himalayas..',
      p2: 'Exquisite Architecture.',
      p3: 'Elevation:  3,580 m',
      p4:' A trekkers paradise'
    },
    {
      id: 8,
      image: "images/places/meetha.jpg",
      title: "Meetha Reetha ",
      info: "Celebrated Gurudwara ",
      to: '/meethareetha',
      name: 'Meetha Reetha',
      p1: 'Revered destination for Sikhs.',
      p2: '72 km from Champawat town.',
      p3: 'Famous Baisakhi Poornima.',
      p4:'Constructed in 1960.'
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      image: "images/places/Katarmal-Temple.jpg",
      title: "Sun Temple",
      info: "Amazing Architecture",
      to: '/katarmalsun',
      name: 'Katarmal Temple',
      p1: ' Amazing Architectural Design.',
      p2: 'Located near Almora.',
      p3: 'Elevation: 2,116 m',
      p4:'Second most beautiful temple.'
    },
  ];
  
  export default weekendapi;
